code: var url="https://vpic.nhtsa.dot.gov/api/vehicles/GetMakesForVehicleType/car?format=json";export var addCar=function addCar(car){return{type:'ADD_CAR',value:car};};export var removeCar=function removeCar(index){return{type:'REMOVE_CAR',value:index};};export var fetchMakes=function fetchMakes(){return function(dispatch){fetch(url).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(response){var action={type:'FETCH_MAKES',value:response.Results};dispatch(action);});};};export var deleteMakes=function deleteMakes(index){return{type:'DELETE_MAKES',value:index};};
